basics.name: Zixuan Li
basics.label: Undergraduate Student
basics.summary: Third-year undergraduate student majoring in Computer Science and Technology at USTC. Research interests include AI computing systems, deep learning processors, and hardware–software co-design. Solid foundation in computer science, mathematics, and physics. Passionate about scientific research and aiming to contribute to the design of high-performance processors for AI applications.

education.institution: University of Science and Technology of China

skills.name: Core Competencies
keywords: Strong foundation in mathematics and physics

awards.title: National Scholarship (国家奖学金)
awards.summary: Awarded for outstanding academic performance and research potential.

awards.title: First Prize (Team Leader)
awards.awarder: National Collegiate System Capability Competition (Loongson Cup)
awards.summary: Led the team to win the First Prize in the CPU Design Competition.
